description: This Dart source file defines several state management classes for a Flutter application, including authentication, game listing, leaderboard handling with real-time updates via WebSocket or polling, and user settings. It also includes provider setup functions for dependency injection.

classes.name: _LoadableState
classes.description: A base class with loading/error state management for async operations.

classes.name: AuthProvider
classes.description: Manages user authentication tokens, session persistence, and sign-in/sign-out logic.

classes.name: GameItem
classes.description: Represents a game with minimal properties, includes JSON deserialization.

classes.name: GamesProvider
classes.description: Fetches and maintains a list of games, with fallback to mock data on failure.

classes.name: LeaderboardEntry
classes.description: Represents a leaderboard entry with rank, player, and points, with JSON deserialization.

classes.name: LeaderboardProvider
classes.description: Manages leaderboard data, including real-time updates via WebSocket or polling, with configuration based on user settings.

classes.name: SettingsProvider
classes.description: Stores and retrieves user preferences such as notifications, theme, language, font size, WebSocket usage, and polling interval.

methods.name: initialize
methods.description: Initializes the provider with persisted data.

methods.name: setNotifications
methods.description: Sets notification preference and persists it.

methods.name: setHighContrast
methods.description: Sets high contrast theme preference and persists it.

methods.name: setLanguageCode
methods.description: Sets language preference and persists it.

methods.name: setFontScale
methods.description: Sets font scale preference and persists it.

methods.name: setWebsocketEnabled
methods.description: Enables or disables WebSocket in favor of polling and persists the setting.

methods.name: setPollIntervalMs
methods.description: Sets polling interval and persists it.

methods.name: fetchGames
methods.description: Loads the list of games from the backend, falling back to mock data if necessary.

methods.name: initializeRealtime
methods.description: Configures real-time leaderboard updates based on user settings, setting up WebSocket or polling.

methods.name: fetchLeaderboard
methods.description: Fetches leaderboard data, with fallback to mock data.
